playing a little Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare. http://raptr.com/pseudoplacebo

Summer Is Cloves and Vanilla Coke
Wanting to see Imogen Heap in NYC. Wanting to buy tickets RIGHT NOW. http://is.gd/4u6nz
I am too used to talking to my girlfriend all the timeee. I miss her a lot. =]
Pandora insists that when I want to listen to Animal Collective that I follow it up with TV On The Radio. I'm not opposed, actually.
Okay Demonoid. I'm done crying over you. I need a waffles invite or what.cd or whatever the kids are using these days.
Afraid to buy myself books off my Amazon wishlist until my birthday passes...
ooooh... dragonheart is on Hulu. I will definitely definitely watch that.
I've been using Flock for the last week or so and it hasn't crashed once. This when Safari, Camino, AND Firefox all crash 3-4x a day...
Operation Unchap Lips was going moderately well until I LOST MY CHAPSTICK auishdfuashd
Awoked with a stomach hurting. NOTICING A THEME TWITTER?!
I suppose I shall sleep, then.
@lotd "Don't need another love song, we need a love bomb... to just blow us away" Love Bomb - N*E*R*D
Did a little two-minute interlude where I just solo'd over the Amen Break... eh. It got out the creative energy. =P
Feeling incredibly inspired to make some mother fucking music.
Oh shit Kanye loves auto-tune almost as much as I do.
I've got 187 songs rated 4.5 stars or better. That's... a lot
Making some brownies and chilling...
Ugh. I downloaded The Smith's discography and it's in .ogg. Thanks for nothing, piracy.
Pushing Daisies is AMAZING. Narrated by Jim Dale, it's witty and silly and great. I love it.
Desktop tower defense, and then I am going to watch some pushing daisies.
Coding a little. But it's annoying me. Bad day indeed.
Played some drums. Practicing double-bass stuff. Fun and stuff but I'm just not feeling to happy today. Rargh.
Eating leftover chinese food and trying to find something to entertain myself with...
Waking up... Was gonna chill with Max today but he had to work, apparently. I'll just do what I normally do then...
So incredibly bored. Incredibly bored.
Doing so so so so so so so so poorly at Hex. How disappointing.
